str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Compound of heros and eidos; heroic; Herod, the name of four Jewish kings.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: To end, finish, die, complete. From a presumed derivative of teleo; to finish life, i.e. Expire.
From aggello; a messenger; especially an 'angel'; by implication, a pastor.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Prolongation for the base of phos; to lighten, i.e. Show.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
A dream. Of uncertain derivation; a dream.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Joseph, a proper name. Of Hebrew origin; Joseph, the name of seven Israelites.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
